intro: Noccaea stenoptera, commonly known as narrow-leaved honesty, is a flowering plant in the family Brassicaceae. It is characterized by its small, white flowers and heart-shaped leaves. The plant typically grows in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in disturbed areas or along roadsides. It is native to Europe and parts of Asia and is known for its short stature and delicate appearance. Noccaea stenoptera is often cultivated in gardens for its ornamental value and easy care requirements.
